124 INSTRUCTIO PIE VIVENDI

ghruamdha. Da n-osluicthir 511111 (10 chroidhi ar feadh do
bheatha mar so, ni h-eadh 3111113111 3(103131 111 10011, 30111 013011
do 01111135 (1001111111 113 50111111151.
